Translations.Text: Aey logon jo imaan laye ho , tumhare maal aur tumhari auladein tumko Allah ki yaad se gaafil na kardein. Jo log aisa karein wahi khasare (nuqsan /loss) mein rehne waley hain

Jo rizq humne tumhein diya hai usmein se kharch karo qabl iske ke tum mein se kisi ki maut ka waqt aa jaye aur us waqt woh kahey "Aey mere Rubb, kyun na tu nay mujhey thodi si mahulat aur de di ke main sadaqa deta aur saleh logon mein shamil ho jata‚Äù
Halanke jab kisi ki mahulat-e-amal puri hone ka waqt aa jata hai to Allah us ko hargiz mazeed mahulat nahin deta, aur jo kuch tum karte ho, Allah usse bakhabar hai
